scope.gco:CharacterString: Codelists for description of metadata datasets compliant with ISO/TC 211 19115:2003 and 19139

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: Codelijsten voor kerngegevens nederlandse metadatastandaard voor geografie conform ISO/TC 211 19115:2003 and 19139

ML_CodeListDictionary.gml:description: identification of when a given event occurred

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: date identifies when the resource was brought into existence
ML_CodeDefinition.gml:name: creation

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Datum waarop de dataset of dataset serie is gecreëerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: creatie

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: date identifies when the resource was issued
ML_CodeDefinition.gml:name: publication

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Datum waarop de dataset of dataset serie is gepubliceerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: publicatie

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: date identifies when the resource was examined or re-examined and imporved or amended
ML_CodeDefinition.gml:name: revision

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Datum waarop de dataset of dataset serie is gecontroleerd, verbeterd of is gewijzigd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: revisie

CodeListDictionary.gml:description: function performed by the responsible party

CodeDefinition.gml:description: party that supplies the resource

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Organisatie die de data verstrekt.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: verstrekker

CodeDefinition.gml:description: party that accepts accountability and responsability for the data and ensures appropriate care and maintenance of the resource

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Partij die verantwoordelijkheid heeft geaccepteerd en zorg draagt voor het beheer van de data.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: beheerder

CodeDefinition.gml:description: party that owns the resource

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Partij die eigenaar is van de data.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: eigenaar

CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who uses the resource

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Partij die de data gebruikt.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: gebruiker

CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who distributes the resource

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Partij die de data verstrekt.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: distributeur

CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who created the resource

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Partij die de data heeft gecreëerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: maker

CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who can be contacted for acquiring knowledge about or acquisition of the resource

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Partij waarmee contact kan worden opgenomen voor het vergaren van kennis of verstrekking van de data.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: contactpunt

CodeDefinition.gml:description: key party responsible for gathering information and conducting research

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Sleutelpartij verantwoordelijk voor verzamelen van data en de uitvoering van onderzoek.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: inwinner

CodeDefinition.gml:description: party wha has processed the data in a manner such that the resource has been modified

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Partij die de data heeft bewerkt, zodanig dat de data is gewijzigd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: bewerker

CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who published the resource

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Partij die de data publiceert.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: uitgever

CodeDefinition.gml:description: party who authored the resource

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Partij die auteur is van de data.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: auteur

ML_CodeListDictionary.gml:description: name of the character coding standard used in the resource

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: 16-bit fixed size Universal Character Set, based on ISO/IEC 10646

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: 16 bits ISO/IEC 10646

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: 32-bit fixed size Universal Character Set, based on ISO/IEC 10646

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: 32 bits ISO/IEC 10646

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: 7-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: 7 bits ISO/IEC 10646

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: 8-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: 8 bits ISO/IEC 10646

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: 16-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: 16 bits ISO/IEC 10646

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-1, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 1 : Latin alphabet No.1

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-1, alphabet latin 1

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-2, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 2 : Latin alphabet No.2

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-2, alphabet latin 2

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-3, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 3 : Latin alphabet No.3

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-3, alphabet latin 3

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-4, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 4 : Latin alphabet No.4

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-4, alphabet latin 4

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-5, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 5 : Latin/Cyrillic alphabet

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-5, alphabet latin/cyrillique

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-6, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 6 : Latin/Arabic alphabet

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-6, alphabet latin/arabe

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-7, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 7 : Latin/Greek alphabet

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-7, alphabet latin/grec

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-8, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 8 : Latin/Hebrew alphabet

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-8, alphabet latin/hébreu

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-9, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 9 : Latin alphabet No.5

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-9, alphabet latin 5

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-10, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 10 : Latin alphabet No.6

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-10, alphabet latin 6

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-11, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 11 : Latin/Thai alphabet

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-11, alphabet latin/Thaï

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-13, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 13 : Latin alphabet No.7

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-13, alphabet latin 7

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-14, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 14 : Latin alphabet No.8 (Celtic)

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-14, alphabet latin 8 (celtique)

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-15, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 15 : Latin alphabet No.9

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-15, alphabet latin 9

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-16, Information technology - 8-bit single byte coded graphic character sets - Part 16 : Latin alphabet No.10

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO/IEC 8859-16, alphabet latin 10

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: japanese code set used for electronic transmission

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Japonais

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: japanese code set used on MS-DOS machines

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Japonais pour MS-DOS

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: japanese code set used on UNIX based machines

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Japonais pour UNIX

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: United States ASCII code set (ISO 646 US)

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: ISO 646 US

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: IBM mainframe code set

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: IBM

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: Korean code set

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Koréen

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: traditional Chinese code set used in Taiwan, Hong Kong of China and other areas

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Chinois traditionel (Taiwan, Hong Kong, Chine)

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: simplified Chinese code set

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Chinois simplifié

CodeListDictionary.gml:description: name of the handling restrictions on the dataset

CodeDefinition.gml:description: available for general disclosure

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Beschikbaar voor algemene ontsluiting.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: vrij toegankelijk

CodeDefinition.gml:description: not for general disclosure

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Niet geschikt voor algemene ontsluiting.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: niet toegankelijk

CodeDefinition.gml:description: available for someone who can be entrusted with information

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Beschikbaar voor personen die vertrouwd kan omgaan met de informatie.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: vertrouwelijk

CodeDefinition.gml:description: kept or meant to be kept private, unknown, or hidden from all but a select group of people

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Dient geheim en verborgen te worden gehouden voor iedereen behalve een geselecteerde groep personen.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: geheim

CodeDefinition.gml:description: of the highest secrecy

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Hoogste geheimhouding verplicht.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: zeer geheim

CodeListDictionary.gml:description: frequency with which modifications and deletions are made to the data after it is first produced

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is repeatedly and frequently updated

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt herhaaldelijk en vaak geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: continu

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated each day

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt elke dag geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: dagelijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated on a weekly basis

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt wekelijks geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: wekelijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated every two weeks

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt 2-wekelijks geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 2-wekelijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated each month

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt maandelijks geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: maandelijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated every three months

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt elke kwartaal geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 1 x per kwartaal

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated twice each year

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt half jaarlijks geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 1 x per half jaar

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated every year

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt jaarlijks geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated within 2 years

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt één keer per 2 jaar geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 2-jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated within 3 years

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt één keer per 3 jaar geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 3-jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated within 4 years

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt één keer per 4 jaar geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 4-jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated within 5 years

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt één keer per 5 jaar geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 5-jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated within 6 years

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt één keer per 6 jaar geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 6-jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated within 7 years

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt één keer per 7 jaar geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 7-jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated within 8 years

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt één keer per 8 jaar geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 8-jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated within 9 years

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt één keer per 9 jaar geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 9-jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated within 10 years

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt één keer per 10 jaar geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: 10-jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is not updated within 10 years

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt niet binnen 10 jaar geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: Meer dan 10-jaarlijks

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated as deemed necessary

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt geactualiseerd indien nodig.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: indien nodig

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is updated in intervals that are uneven in duration

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt geactualiseerd in intervallen die niet even lang duren.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: onregelmatig

CodeDefinition.gml:description: there are no plans to update the data

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Er zijn geen plannen om de data te actualiseren.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: niet gepland

CodeDefinition.gml:description: frequency of maintenance for the data is not known

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Herzieningsfrequentie is niet bekend.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: onbekend

CodeListDictionary.gml:description: status of the dataset or progress of a review

CodeDefinition.gml:description: production of the data has been completed

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Productie van de data is compleet / afgerond.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: compleet

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data has been stored in an offline storage facility

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: De data is opgeslagen in een offline opslagmedium.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: historisch archief

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is no longer relevant

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data is niet langer relevant.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: niet relevant

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is continually being updated

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt continu geactualiseerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: continu geactualiseerd

CodeDefinition.gml:description: fixed date has been established upon or by which the data will be created or updated

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Datum is al bekend wanneer de data gecreëerd of geactualiseerd moet zijn.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: gepland

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data needs to be generated or updated

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data moet nog gegenereerd of geactualiseerd worden.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: actualisatie vereist

CodeDefinition.gml:description: data is currently in the process of being created

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data wordt momenteel gecreëerd.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: in ontwikkeling

CodeListDictionary.gml:description: limitation(s) placed upon the access or use of the data

CodeDefinition.gml:description: exclusive right to the publication, production, or sale of the rights to a literary, dramatic, musical, or artistic work, or to the use of a commercial print or label, granted by law for a specified period of time to an author, composer, artist, distributor

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Exclusief recht voor publicatie, productie, of verkoop van rechten op een literair, theater, muzikaal of artistiek werk, of op het gebruik van een commerciële druk of label, toegekend bij wet voor een specifieke periode of tijd aan een auteur, componist, artiest of distributeur.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: copyright

CodeDefinition.gml:description: government has granted exclusive right to make, sell, use or license an invention or discovery

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Overheid heeft een exclusief recht toegekend om een uitvinding te maken, verkopen, gebruiken of in licentie uit te geven.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: patent

CodeDefinition.gml:description: produced or sold information awaiting a patent

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Geproduceerde of verkochte informatie wachtend op een patent.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: patent in wording

CodeDefinition.gml:description: a name, symbol, or other device identifying a product, officially registered and legally restricted to the use of the owner or manufacturer

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Een naam, symbool of ander object om een product te identificeren, wat officieel geregistreerd is en gebruik wettelijk voorbehouden is aan de eigenaar of fabrikant.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: merknaam

CodeDefinition.gml:description: formal permission to do something

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Formele toestemming of iets te doen.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: licentie

CodeDefinition.gml:description: rights to financial benefit from and control of distribution of non-tangible property that is a result of creativity

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Recht op een financieel voordeel van en controle hebben op de distributie een niet tastbaar eigendom wat het resultaat is van creativiteit.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: intellectueel eigendom

CodeDefinition.gml:description: withheld from general circulation or disclosure

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Verbod op distributie en gebruik.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: niet toegankelijk

CodeDefinition.gml:description: limitation not listed

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Restrictie niet opgenomen in lijst.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: anders

CodeListDictionary.gml:description: class of information to which the referencing entity applies

CodeDefinition.gml:description: information applies to the dataset

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Informatie heeft betrekking op de dataset.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: dataset

CodeDefinition.gml:description: information applies to the series

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Informatie heeft betrekking op de serie.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: series

CodeDefinition.gml:description: information applies to a capability which a service provider entity makes available to a service user entity through a set of interfaces that define a behaviour, such as a use case

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Informatie heeft betrekking op de service.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: service

CodeListDictionary.gml:description: method used to represent geographic information in the dataset

CodeDefinition.gml:description: vector data is used to represent geographic data

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Vector data wordt gebruikt om geografische data te representeren.

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Grid data wordt gebruikt om geografische data te representeren.

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: grid data is used to represent geographic data

CodeDefinition.gml:description: textual or tabular data is used to represent geographic data

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Tekstuele of tabel data wordt gebruikt om geografische data te representeren

CodeDefinition.gml:description: triangulated irregular network

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: triangulated irregular network

CodeDefinition.gml:description: three-dimensional view formed by the intersecting homologous rays of an overlapping pair of images

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: 3D overzicht wordt gevormd door intersectie van twee kernstralen van twee overlappende beelden.

CodeDefinition.gml:description: scene from a video recording

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Scène uit een video opname.

CodeListDictionary.gml:description: high-level geographic data thematic classification to assist in the grouping and search of available geographic data sets. Can be used to group keywords as well. Listed examples are not exhaustive.

CodeDefinition.gml:description: rearing of animals and/or cultivation of plants. Examples: agriculture, irrigation, aquaculture, plantations, herding, pests and diseases affecting crops and livestock

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Houden van dieren en/of verbouwen van planten. Vb: landbouw, irrigatie, ziekten die gewassen aantasten.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: landbouw en veeteelt

CodeDefinition.gml:description: flora and/or fauna in natural environment. Examples: wildlife, vegetation, biological sciences, ecology, wilderness, sealife, wetlands, habitat

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Flora en fauna in natuurlijke omgeving. Vb: habitats, ecologie.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: biota

CodeDefinition.gml:description: legal land descriptions. Examples: political and administrative boundaries

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Wettelijke gebiedsbeschrijvingen. Vb: politieke en administratieve grenzen.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: grenzen

CodeDefinition.gml:description: processes and phenomena of the atmosphere. Examples: cloud cover, weather, climate, atmospheric conditions, climate change, precipitation

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Processen en fenomenen in de atmosfeer. Vb: wolkbedekking, weer, klimaat verandering.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: klimatologie, meteorologie, atmosfeer

CodeDefinition.gml:description: economic activities, conditions and employment. Examples: production, labour, revenue, commerce, industry, tourism and ecotourism, forestry, fisheries, commercial or subsistence hunting, exploration and exploitation of resources such as minerals, oil and gas

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Economische activiteiten, condities en werkgelegenheid. Vb: Werkgelegenheid, industrie, toerisme, olie- en gasvelden, bosbouw, visserij.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: economie

CodeDefinition.gml:description: height above or below sea level. Examples: altitude, bathymetry, digital elevation models, slope, derived products

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Hoogte boven of onder zeeniveau. Vb: hoogtekaart, DEM, hellingen.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: hoogte

CodeDefinition.gml:description: environmental resources, protection and conservation. Examples: environmental pollution, waste storage and treatment, environmental impact assessment, monitoring environmental risk, nature reserves, landscape

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Natuurlijke bronnen, bescherming en beheer. Vb: milieuverontreiniging, landschap, natuurlijke reserves, vuilopslag.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: natuur en milieu

CodeDefinition.gml:description: information pertaining to earth sciences. Examples: geophysical features and processes, geology, minerals, sciences dealing with the composition, structure and origin of the earth s rocks, risks of earthquakes, volcanic activity, landslides, gravity information, soils, permafrost, hydrogeology, erosion

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Data die behoort tot een aardwetenschap. Vb: geologie, mineralen, structuur van de aarde, zwaartekrachtskaart, grondstoffen, erosie.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: geowetenschappelijke data

CodeDefinition.gml:description: health, health services, human ecology, and safety. Examples: disease and illness, factors affecting health, hygiene, substance abuse, mental and physical health, health services

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Gezondheid(szorg), menselijke ecologie en veiligheid. Vb: ziekten, hygiëne, gezondheidszorg.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: gezondheid

CodeDefinition.gml:description: base maps. Examples: land cover, topographic maps, imagery, unclassified images, annotations

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Basiskaarten. Vb: landbedekking, topografische kaarten, foto’s, ongeclassificeerde kaarten.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: referentie materiaal aardbedekking

CodeDefinition.gml:description: military bases, structures, activities. Examples: barracks, training grounds, military transportation, information collection

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Militaire basissen, structuren en activiteiten. Vb: barakken, oefenterreinen, militaire transporten.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: militair

CodeDefinition.gml:description: inland water features, drainage systems and their characteristics. Examples: rivers and glaciers, salt lakes, water utilization plans, dams, currents, floods, water quality, hydrographic charts

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Binnenwater, drainagesystemen en hun karakteristieken. Vb: Rivieren en gletsjers, dijken, stromen, waterzuiveringsinstallaties, overloopgebieden.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: binnenwater

CodeDefinition.gml:description: positional information and services. Examples: addresses, geodetic networks, control points, postal zones and services, place names

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Positionele informatie en services. Vb: adressen, geodetisch netwerk, postcode gebieden, plaatsnamen, controlepunten.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: locatie

CodeDefinition.gml:description: features and characteristics of salt water bodies (excluding inland waters). Examples: tides, tidal waves, coastal information, reefs

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Gebieden met zoutwaterlichamen (niet binnenlands). Vb: Getijden, tsunami’s, kustinformatie, riffen.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: oceanen

CodeDefinition.gml:description: information used for appropriate actions for future use of the land. Examples: land use maps, zoning maps, cadastral surveys, land ownership

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Informatie die gebruikt wordt voor nodige planmatige activiteiten. Vb: Landgebruik, kadastrale informatie.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: planning kadaster

CodeDefinition.gml:description: characteristics of society and cultures. Examples: settlements, anthropology, archaeology, education, traditional beliefs, manners and customs, demographic data, recreational areas and activities, social impact assessments, crime and justice, census information

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Kenmerken van maatschappij en culturen. Vb: antropologie, archeologie, criminaliteit, gewoonten, nederzettingen, onderwijs.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: maatschappij

CodeDefinition.gml:description: man-made construction. Examples: buildings, museums, churches, factories, housing, monuments, shops, towers

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Civiele werken (door mensen gemaakte structuren). Gebouwen, musea, kerken, winkels, torens.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: (civiele) structuren

CodeDefinition.gml:description: means and aids for conveying persons and/or goods. Examples: roads, airports/airstrips, shipping routes, tunnels, nautical charts, vehicle or vessel location, aeronautical charts, railways

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Middelen voor vervoer van goederen en/of personen. Vb: Wegen, Vliegvelden, tunnels, spoorwegen.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: transport

CodeDefinition.gml:description: energy, water and waste systems and communications infrastructure and services. Examples: hydroelectricity, geothermal, solar and nuclear sources of energy, water purification and distribution, sewage collection and disposal, electricity and gas distribution, data communication, telecommunication, radio, communication networks

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Communication Energie, waterleidingen en riolering en communicatie infrastructuren en services. Vb: elektriciteit- en gasdistributie, waterzuivering en verstrekking, telecommunicatie, radio.
CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:name: nutsbedrijven communicatie

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: English

CodeAlternativeExpression.gml:description: Engels

ML_CodeDefinition.gml:description: Dutch
